## Download Data from Gene Expression Omnibus

### GSE99765: Cellular dissociation data

The cellcular dissociation experimental data is found here: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE99765

~~~
cd ../data/
wget 'ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE99nnn/GSE99765/suppl/GSE99765%5FDissociationColData%2Ecsv%2Egz'
wget 'ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE99nnn/GSE99765/suppl/GSE99765%5FDissociationCountData%2Ecsv%2Egz'
gunzip *.gz
~~~
